function.name: sqlescape
function.description: Returns an SQL-escaped version of string value. This is essential for sending a webpage or unchecked input to an XML database.

examples.example: <note id="1"> <to>Tove</to> <from>Jani</from> <heading>Reminder</heading> <comment>This was sent to James as well</comment> <comment>John has not responded to the invitation</comment> <body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body> </note>

example.description: for sending it to a database one might use:

examples.example:
<note id="1">
 <to>Tove</to>
 <from>Jani</from>
 <heading>Reminder</heading>
 <comment>This was sent to James as well</comment>
 <comment>John has not responded to the invitation</comment>
 <body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body>
</note>
